name: Natalia Norman
about: The isolation is great in my opinion and the sound on calls is way better than average!

name: Kinney William
about: The battery lasts a long time. Easy to use. 1st time I've had wireless headphones. Sound is great. For beat headphones pretty good price.

name: Beryl Snyder
about: Really happy I bought these, I have been using ear phones and the difference in sound quality and comfort is amazing, the sound is a lot better and keeps your ears warm.

name: Alba Molina
about: They are amazing, better quality sound than any of my wired sets. Great top end sound; not too much bass and very comfortable.

name: Angelia Franco
about: The product itself is great, lovely color, I got a very good deal as well.

name: Nichols Stephenson
about: Packed really well, love the little bag they come in however its very very snug, I have a job getting them back in. Sound quality good for music and making phone calls.
